body.name: Moisturizing Face Cream – Natural Face Cream with Hyaluronic Acid, Plants Extracts – Intensive Hydration Hyaluronic Acid Cream–Facial Moisturizer for All Skin Types – Hydrating Face Moisturizer
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 19 hrs 39 mins
features: Hydration is the Key: Regardless of your skin type or condition, hydration is essential for maintaining a healthy skin barrier! That’s why our hyaluronic acid moisturizer for face contains a wide range of nourishing ingredients that meet your skin’s hydration needs!

Natural Formulation: The hydrating face moisturizer has a powerful blend of natural ingredients, including plant extracts and hydrating oils that combine their forces to help nourish, repair and hydrate your skin.

Intensive Hydration: Enriched with hyaluronic acid, a powerful humectant, this night moisturizer for face can help boost hydration, replenish the skin barrier and capture moisture within the skin for a long-lasting moisturizing effect.

Formulated with Safe Ingredients: The Auzon daily moisturizer for face is formulated with your skin’s safety in mind. That’s why our face cream has no irritants, unnecessary fillers or additives and it’s safe for all skin types.

Soothing and Fast-Absorbing: This hydrating face cream has a lightweight formulation that’s quickly absorbed into the skin without causing any discomfort or irritation. Ideal for day or night application to help soothe and seal the nutrients in the skin.
body.description: AUZON is a brand focused on delivering amazing skincare formulas made with safe, natural ingredients specially developed to help contribute to healthy, glowing skin. We are working with carefully selected ingredients and tested blends that are safe for all skin types, packed with nutrients and free of irritants to help your skin thrive! If you are not entirely pleased with your order, there is no need to worry! We are always at your service to resolve any issues in the shortest possible time. Moisturizing Face Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Plant Extracts – Intensive Nourishment and Hydration Our facial cream is crafted with love and care for your skin, using only safe, natural ingredients that will make your skin glow! This natural face moisturizer is crafted with natural plant extracts such as jojoba oil, shea butter, Japanese camellia seed oil and other natural oils, and enriched with hyaluronic acid to help improve and lock in moisture while strengthening the skin barrier. The facial moisturizer has a smooth, non-irritating formula that provides intensive hydration and nourishes your skin from its deepest layers, leaving it soft and radiant. Still not convinced? Here are some of the amazing features of our moisturizing cream: Intensively moisturizing cream for face; Formulated with natural plant extracts and natural oils; Enriched with hyaluronic acid; Deeply nourishing and repairing effect; Non-irritating and soothing; Lightweight, fast-absorbing formula; Can help improve and lock in moisture; May help to strengthen the skin barrier; Long-lasting hydration; Compact and portable bottle with pump; 1.76fl oz; Give your skin essential nutrients and intensive hydration with the AUZON hyaluronic acid cream!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really nice face cream not too heavy not too light with almost no sense so it really is just right in my preference. The container feels a little cheap but I do love how it can pump the cream out or you can unscrew the top and use anything that remains afterwards so while it doesn’t feel like the most luxurious container in the world. It certainly is a lot more usable than others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use. Smells very nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good facial cream!
reviews.reviewText: This lotion has been a welcome addition to my skincare routine. This natural face cream, enriched with hyaluronic acid and plant extracts, offers intensive hydration and serves as an excellent facial moisturizer suitable for all skin types.What immediately struck me about this product is its remarkable ability to hydrate my skin. The hyaluronic acid works wonders in maintaining moisture, and the plant extracts add a refreshing touch. It feels incredibly light on the skin, and a little goes a long way, so you don't need to reapply often.I appreciate the fact that this cream caters to all skin types. Whether you have dry, oily, or sensitive skin, it seems to adapt and provide the necessary hydration without causing any issues.The cream doesn't leave any residue or greasy feeling on my skin, which is a huge plus. It's also versatile enough to use day and night, simplifying my skincare routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice lotion with a unique bottle
reviews.reviewText: There’s a clear difference between good and bad face lotions and this is a good one. It has almost no scent which I prefer. The top doesn’t come off but instead it’s a pump mechanism. This in theory is a good idea, possibly preventing bacteria from your face getting back in the lotion container, but I also think this will leave lotion in the container when it’s ready to throw away. I’m not sure so we’ll see.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product and after using it for a while I feel it is good value for what it is. I feel moisturized without being sticky after and there's a decent amount. No noticeable scent to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizer is very nice. Soft, smooth, moisturizing, easy to apply, not too heavy, feels light, absorbs easily, helps with elasticity on your skin, and has a nice scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Este producto deben probarlo antes , me quemo la piel al parecer soy alérgica algún ingrediente

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The Moisture is NOT Very Moist
reviews.reviewText: I am 33 years old and have struggled with dry skin for the vast majority of my life. Unfortunately, you can pile this stuff onto your skin and the moisturizing effect is still extremely short lived. I have used cheap/off-brand lotions that do a better job than this stuff. I am extremely disappointed in the efficacy of this product.
